Subject: Error message when tried to send repport by sheduled task after update to 3.3.0.1
Description: Hi, i have tried to update my product today as usual do all 6 months. from Pingcastle pro 3.2.0.1 to Pingcastle pro 3.3.0.1. i have also updated the version of .NET (ASP.NET Core Runtime 8.0.11 Hosting Bundle). when i restart the product all seams fine and it show me the right version. (3.3.0.1) by the whay, when i tried to my sheduled task to send my rapport my dailly repport by mail, the application Crash ant nothing is received. i have an event on application log that repport me Event: 1000 and 1026 about Crash. Ex: Application : PingCastle.exe Version du Framework : v4.0.30319 Description : le processus a été arrêté en raison d'une exception non gérée. Informations sur l'exception : System.IO.FileNotFoundException à PingCastle.Cloud.Common.HttpClientHelper.EnableLoging(PingCastle.Cloud.Logs.SazGenerator) à PingCastle.Program.Main(System.String[]) ++++++ Nom de l’application défaillante PingCastle.exe, version : 3.3.0.1, horodatage : 0x6734f220 Nom du module défaillant : KERNELBASE.dll, version : 10.0.14393.7513, horodatage : 0x671730ce Code d’exception : 0xe0434352 Décalage d’erreur : 0x0000000000026ea8 ID du processus défaillant : 0x1cb4 Heure de début de l’application défaillante : 0x01db4712f6e85186 Chemin d’accès de l’application défaillante : C:PingCastleProPingCastle.exe Chemin d’accès du module défaillant: C:WindowsSystem32KERNELBASE.dll ID de rapport : 15c6893d-f0ef-4c2f-a570-0f3dba56dcbd Nom complet du package défaillant : ID de l’application relative au package défaillant : Could you please help us on this case ? brgds,
What_We_Know__c: After upgrading PC to pro 3.3.0.1, reports are not being sent and the application is crashing.
Next_Steps__c: Wait for confirmation from customer if the error is still present after upgrading NET Framework to 4.7.2
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom
After upgrading PC to pro 3.3.0.1, reports are not being sent and the application is crashing.


Resolution
Upgrade .NET Framework to 4.7.2
